item.title: What's New
item.body: This page will be used to alert users about new features and modules for MIT mobile services.
item.dc:creator: mobi

item.title: Customize Home
item.body: Users can now select which items they want to show up on the MIT Mobile Homepage. Simply click on Customize Home. Select which modules you want to be active, and reorder them as you wish them to appear.
item.dc:creator: mobi

item.title: MIT SMS (Beta) Services
item.body: MIT now has a text messaging service, which allows users to query information from the People Directory, Shuttle Schedule, or Stellar.
item.dc:creator: mobi

item.title: TechCASH (Beta)
item.body: TechCASH users with an iPhone may now view their accounts on the MIT Mobile Web. Note: viewing your TechCASH account requires MIT Certificates.
item.dc:creator: sonya

item.title: Summer Shuttle Schedule
item.body: The Shuttle Schedule has been updated to include the summer routes: Boston All and Cambridge All.
item.dc:creator: sonya

item.title: Fall Shuttle Schedule
item.body: The Shuttle Schedule has been updated for the Fall 2009 schedule.
item.dc:creator: andrewyu

item.title: My Stellar
item.body: Users may now save a list of favorite classes in the MIT Mobile Web Stellar module. To save a class, navigate to the class detail screen and click the "My Stellar" link. Click the link again to remove the class.
item.dc:creator: sonya

item.title: MIT Mobile iPhone App
item.body: The MIT Mobile iPhone App is now available. Download the iPhone app from the App Store.
item.dc:creator: andrewyu
